title: Coastal California Escape with Daily Breakfast, Cocktails & Activities
description: Set out on the open road for a California road trip and experience the coastal beauty of the natural playground of Big Sur. Located along the coastal route between L.A. and San Francisco, the tranquil Ventana Big Sur, An Alila Resort, was recently voted onto Condé Nast Traveler‘s 2018 Hot List and offers five-star luxury near hidden beaches, waterfalls and forest. Includes daily breakfast, cocktails and activities like yoga, and sommelier wine and cheese hours.
location_description: Ventana Big Sur, An Alila Resort
